testName: Login with valid credentials and open savings account

steps.step: Navigate to ParaBank login page at 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm'
Navigate to Open New Account page at 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/openaccount.htm'

testName: Verify transaction history for new savings account

steps.step: Navigate to ParaBank login page at 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm'
Navigate to Open New Account page at 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/openaccount.htm'
Click on the new account number link in the account overview page
Verify the transaction history for the new savings account
